title: Simple Ways to Get the Skull Guitar in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Meet the requirements.
steps.content: Meet the requirements. You must be level 2300+ and you can only start this puzzle under a full moon. You'll see a chat message when the full moon begins: "The light of the full moon peaks through the clouds" and when the full moon ends: "The full moon ends." [1] X Research source A full moon happens randomly every 3-4 in-game days (or 60-80 minutes). You also need some materials, including 5,000 fragments , 500 bones, 250 ectoplasm, and 1 Dark Fragment.

steps.title: Go to the left side of the Haunted Castle at night.
steps.content: Go to the left side of the Haunted Castle at night. You'll find the Haunted Castle Island in the Third Sea. Go to the left side where there is a graveyard, and walk inside, sticking to the left. The grave you want is marked with a "?", but if you can't find it, you're most likely not under a full moon.

steps.title: Interact with the gravestone and select Pray.
steps.content: Interact with the gravestone and select Pray . It's usually the first option in the menu. [2] X Research source Start the puzzle by selecting Yes next. You'll see some candles on the grave that indicate that the puzzle has started.

steps.title: Defeat all the living zombies at the same time.
steps.content: Defeat all the living zombies at the same time. Find the living zombies on the other side of the Haunted Castle Island. [3] X Research source Use your gun to hit each zombie to get them to attack you, then lure them into the Red Lake. Don't worry if you don't get them all on the first try since you can keep trying to kill them all at the same time repeatedly. Once you achieve this goal, your screen will momentarily flash black and say "Excellent".

steps.title: Return to the graveyard.
steps.content: Return to the graveyard. You'll notice that on either side of the pathway, there are graves lined up in different amounts. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click the sign on the side that has more graves in each row.
steps.content: Click the sign on the side that has more graves in each row. For example, if the first row has 3 graves on the left and 7 on the right, click the right sign since 7 is more than 3. Each instance has a different amount of graves for this puzzle, so one answer does not apply to everyone. When you've successfully clicked the signs, your screen will flash black and say "Excellent."

steps.title: Talk to the Ghost NPC.
steps.content: Talk to the Ghost NPC. Go into the main entrance of Haunted Castle and you'll find Ghost in there. He says "..." which means that you need to continue with the puzzle.

steps.title: Study the garden trophies.
steps.content: Study the garden trophies. Each trophy is aligned vertically or horizontally with trees sporadically placed around them. Since you need to replicate this pattern, write it down or take a screenshot .

steps.title: Find the pipe panel in the basement.
steps.content: Find the pipe panel in the basement. This panel is a bunch of tiles that represent pipes. Use the garden outline or screenshot from the previous step to recreate the trophy layout. For example, turn the tile to make a pipe vertical to match a vertical trophy. Remove a pipe tile if there is a tree in that space in your diagram of the garden. [5] X Research source Each instance of this has a different pattern, so the answer that worked for someone else may not work for you. Again, completing this successfully means your screen flashes black and reads "Excellent."

steps.title: Match the floor tiles to the pipe colors.
steps.content: Match the floor tiles to the pipe colors. You'll see black tiles on the floor. Look up and around you to see colored pipes on the walls or ceiling. Click the tile so it changes color to reflect the pipe that's in the same grid line as the tile on the floor. [6] X Research source Each instance of this has a different pattern, so the answer that worked for someone else may not work for you. Completing this successfully means your screen flashes black and reads "Congratulations."

steps.title: Interact with the Weird Machine and craft Skull Guitar.
steps.content: Interact with the Weird Machine and craft Skull Guitar. The Weird Machine looks like the pipe panel that you previously interacted with. If you have 500 Bones, 250 Ectoplasm, 1 Dark Fragment, and 5,000 Fragments, you can get the Skull Guitar. Tap Craft to get it. [7] X Research source
